snippet: The S.E.C. said the firm did not inform clients in three funds of the financial benefits Blackstone received in monitoring companies in these portfolios.
abstract: DealBook Online; Securities and Exchange Commission announces settlement with three funds managed by Blackstone Group in which funds will pay around $39 million over way Blackstone sets fees.
lead_paragraph: The S.E.C. said the firm did not inform clients in three funds of the financial benefits Blackstone received in monitoring companies in these portfolios.

headline.main: Blackstone to Pay $39 Million Over Fee Disclosures
